Class FitnessEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CFitnessEvaluatorService.Iface

    public class FitnessEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
implements CFitnessEvaluatorService.Iface
    Class that implements the Thrift interface of the FitnessEvaluatorService. Method calls over Thrift are redirected to this class. For more information, refer to the Thrift interface file.

    Jonathan Merlevede
